com.communote.server.core.mail.fetching

Class ImapMailboxConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.mail.fetching.MailboxConnection
      • com.communote.server.core.mail.fetching.ImapMailboxConnection

  • public class ImapMailboxConnection
extends MailboxConnection
    MailboxConnection implementation using the IMAP protocol.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Detail

      • expungeMessages

        public boolean expungeMessages()
        Expunge messages with the deleted flag. See java mail API for protocol specific considerations when implementing this method.
        Specified by:
        expungeMessages in class MailboxConnection
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded

      • getFolder

        protected javax.mail.Folder getFolder()
        Returns the mailbox folder or null if not initialized or available.
        Specified by:
        getFolder in class MailboxConnection
        Returns:
        the folder

      • getProtocolName

        public String getProtocolName()
        Returns the name of the protocol used by this connection (e.g. "imap" or "pop3").
        Specified by:
        getProtocolName in class MailboxConnection
        Returns:
        the protocol name

      • getUniqueMessageId

        public String getUniqueMessageId(javax.mail.Message message)
        Returns a unique id for an email message.
        Specified by:
        getUniqueMessageId in class MailboxConnection
        Parameters:
        message - the message
        Returns:
        the unique id

      • initialize

        public boolean initialize()
        Initializes the connection from configuration properties using the ConfigurationManager. This does not include opening the connection to the mail server.
        Overrides:
        initialize in class MailboxConnection
        Returns:
        true on success or false if the initialization fails for some reason like a configuration problem

      • prepareFetching

        protected void prepareFetching(String mailbox)
                        throws MailboxConnectionException
        Subclasses should use this method for protocol specific initialization. This includes for instance testing if the mailbox exists and can be opened with read and write access rights.
        Specified by:
        prepareFetching in class MailboxConnection
        Parameters:
        mailbox - the mailbox to use. Subclasses should ignore this parameter if they only support a specific mailbox
        Throws:
        MailboxConnectionException - if the connection to the mailbox (folder) failed or was lost

      • processUndeletedMessages

        protected void processUndeletedMessages(MailMessageWorker worker)
        Processes all undeleted messages in a mailbox. Because there are differences when working with imap and pop3 folders (regarding opening and keeping open) subclasses must implement this method.
        Specified by:
        processUndeletedMessages in class MailboxConnection
        Parameters:
        worker - the worker processing the messages

      • startCheckMessages

        protected void startCheckMessages()
                           throws MailboxConnectionException
        Starts checking for messages and blocks until another thread calls the MailboxConnection.disconnect() method or an error or exception (e.g. connection closed, server unreachable) occurs.
        Specified by:
        startCheckMessages in class MailboxConnection
        Throws:
        MailboxConnectionException - in case the message check loop was interrupted by an error or exception

      • stopCheckMessages

        protected void stopCheckMessages()
        Interrupt the check messages loop that was started in MailboxConnection.startCheckMessages(). This method should only be run from another thread than the one that called MailboxConnection.startCheckMessages().
        Specified by:
        stopCheckMessages in class MailboxConnection
